english.segment1: You were someone who I could talk to. If I wanted to. You're one of a kindIf one of a kind means. That you were the only one. And I really don't even think you see. All the things you've done for me. And I will never forget as long as I live
english.segment2: And even after I'm gone. 'Cos then I'll be with you. You never left me alone. My sweet unknown. So sweet, you're so unknown. You could see right through me. Sweet unknown (4X)
english.segment3: You were someone who I could talk to. If I wanted to. You're one of a kind. If one of a kind means. That you are the only one. And I don't even think you see. All the things you've done for me. And I will never forget as long as I live
english.segment4: And even after I'm gone. 'Cos then I'll be with you. You never left me alone. My sweet unknown. So sweet, you're so unknown. You could see right through me. Sweet unknown (2X)
english.segment5: You sent your angels to watch over me. And I feel them. I never wanted to be further away. From the length of your arms. Show and tell is caving in. These angry feelings from within. Hold me tight and don't let go of my hand. Promise me so (3X).
